snippet: It’s not just Apple. Android apps do not need permission to access a user’s photos either, and Google, maker of the Android operating system, takes it a step further.
abstract: It’s not just Apple. Android apps do not need permission to access a user’s photos either, and Google, maker of the Android operating system, takes it a step further.

byline.original: By BRIAN X. CHEN and NICK BILTON

headline.main: Et Tu, Google? Android Apps Can Also Secretly Copy Photos
headline.print_headline: Android Phones Can Secretly Copy Photos and Post Them on Web
